original_text: He is very angry against me. He attacks me as if I am his enemy. He is very angry against me.
korean_text: 나를 향하여 진노하시고 원수 같이 보시는구나

sentences.original_text: He is very angry against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나에게 매우 화가 나 있다.

sentences.original_text: as if I am his enemy.
He is very angry against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나에게 매우 화가 나 있다.
